/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings and trees on both sides. A few cars and a bus can be seen navigating the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the expansive vista. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the surrounding buildings.
